choices.text: Expression: The target grid has more X-shaped cells than either of the distractor grids, particularly in the upper left and lower right corners where there are four consecutive X-shaped cells. Additionally, it has fewer empty cells compared to the distractor grids. In particular, the target grid has only one row with three consecutive empty cells (the second row from the top), while both distractor grids have two rows with three consecutive empty cells each.
